video.title: One Day at a Time
video.synopsis: In a reimagining of the TV classic, a newly single Latina mother raises her teen daughter and tween son with the "help" of her old-school mom.

episodes.synopsis: Penelope tries to convince her feminist daughter Elena to have a traditional quincea√±era to celebrate her 15th birthday and to honor her Cuban roots.
episodes.title: This Is It

episodes.synopsis: When Penelope and Elena complain about not being taken seriously as women at work and school, Lydia offers advice from an older generation.
episodes.title: Bobos and Mamitas

episodes.synopsis: When Lydia disappears after a heated argument with her daughter about religion, the smooth running of the household falls apart in her absence.
episodes.title: No Mass

episodes.synopsis: Penelope suddenly finds herself back in the dating game after Schneider shows her how to use an online app for meeting people.
episodes.title: A Snowman's Tale

episodes.synopsis: Lydia grows suspicious of Elena and Carmen's intense relationship. Penelope later discovers that the inseparable friends are keeping a big secret.
episodes.title: Strays

episodes.synopsis: When Penelope's faithful car finally breaks down for good and she's forced to trade it in, she meets a kindred spirit in the unlikeliest of places.
episodes.title: The Death of Mrs. Resnick

episodes.synopsis: While navigating her way through an endless maze of red tape with Veterans Affairs to make a medical appointment, Penelope reaches her breaking point.
episodes.title: Hold, Please

episodes.synopsis: Penelope tells her family she has a date and Lydia says she's going to church, but each secretly goes elsewhere. Meanwhile, Elena tests an attraction.
episodes.title: One Lie at a Time

episodes.synopsis: Elena gets a congratulatory letter that leaves a bitter taste in her mouth. For a school project, Alex interviews Lydia, who reveals a family secret.
episodes.title: Viva Cuba

episodes.synopsis: When Penelope finds porn on Alex's laptop, she struggles to talk to him about sex, but their reluctant conversation leads to a surprising discovery.
episodes.title: Sex Talk

episodes.synopsis: Although she wants to be accepting and open-minded, Penelope feels weird about Elena's revelation. Seeking advice, she makes an unexpected connection.
episodes.title: Pride & Prejudice

episodes.synopsis: Just when Penelope starts to date again, her estranged husband Victor makes a surprise visit home that rekindles old feelings between them.
episodes.title: Hurricane Victor

episodes.synopsis: Everyone pitches in to prepare for Elena's quincea√±era. While rehearsing their father-daughter dance, Elena reveals a truth about herself to her dad.
episodes.title: Quinces

episodes.synopsis: Penelope worries about changes she sees in Alex, who gets in trouble at school. Elena wonders if others are misidentifying her based on her appearance.
episodes.title: The Turn

episodes.synopsis: When juggling family, work and college proves too much for Penelope, Schneider offers her a way to sharpen her focus and improve her test grades.
episodes.title: Schooled

episodes.synopsis: Lydia gives Elena advice on approaching her crush. After running into a hunky Army buddy who's also single again, Penelope rethinks her dating rules.
episodes.title: To Zir, With Love

episodes.synopsis: Elena is horrified to learn that her grandmother doesn‚Äôt vote. Penelope teaches her son all her tricks on how to save money at the movie theater.
episodes.title: Roots

episodes.synopsis: Penelope's furtive date at home with Max is interrupted when a neighborhood lockdown brings the rest of the family back early.
episodes.title: Locked Down

episodes.synopsis: To teach Alex the value of a dollar, Penelope forces him to take a summer job at her workplace. Meanwhile, Elena finds a way to get paid for her hobby.
episodes.title: Work Hard, Play Hard

episodes.synopsis: Lydia learns Dr. Berkowitz is going to the opera without her. When Schneider asks if she and Max are exclusive, Penelope realizes it's time for a talk.
episodes.title: Exclusive

episodes.synopsis: Penelope recalls Elena's birth in 2001, and how an unexpected turn of events drastically changed the life plans she and her husband had made.
episodes.title: What Happened

episodes.synopsis: Feeling like she's finally got her life together, Penelope unwisely stops taking her antidepressants so she doesn't have to tell Max she's on them.
episodes.title: Hello, Penelope

episodes.synopsis: As Schneider's trainee, Elena learns there's more to being a building super than fixing things. Penelope battles Lydia over the space in their garage.
episodes.title: Storage Wars

episodes.synopsis: At the kids' school dance, Elena tries to appear popular in front of Syd, and chaperones Penelope and Max reach a milestone in their relationship.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Lydia and Schneider take their U.S. citizenship tests. Penelope wonders if she'd be willing to have another child to fulfill Max's wish to be a dad.
episodes.title: Citizen Lydia

episodes.synopsis: A medical emergency brings bedside visits, admissions of regret, moments of realization, declarations of love and an out-of-body experience.
episodes.title: Not Yet

episodes.synopsis: At a relative's funeral, Penelope urges Lydia to end a petty feud with her sister, and Elena wonders if her cousin Pilar is gay.
episodes.title: The Funeral

episodes.synopsis: When Penelope discovers Alex's secret Instagram account, his crass posts spark an intense family discussion about consent and harassment.
episodes.title: Outside

episodes.synopsis: Elena hides her grandmother's high heels. Penelope starts to see a male friend in a new way. Schneider meets a kindred spirit at the school auction.
episodes.title: Benefit with Friends

episodes.synopsis: Sibling rivalry rears its ugly head when Penelope's brother, who can do no wrong in their mother's eyes, shows up during a family getaway to San Diego.
episodes.title: Hermanos

episodes.synopsis: Penelope catches Alex smoking pot at a concert. When Lydia develops a cough at the opera, she tries Dr. B's special lozenges.
episodes.title: Nip It in the Bud

episodes.synopsis: Rain ruins Valentine's Day plans, causing more than one couple to have their first fight. Schneider tries to hide his wealthy background from Avery.
episodes.title: One Valentine's Day at a Time

episodes.synopsis: Penelope finds out Elena and Syd secretly got a hotel room. A grounded Alex enlists Lydia to stand in line to buy him the latest designer sneakers.
episodes.title: The First Time

episodes.synopsis: Penelope feels hurt after seeing an item on her mom's "bouquet list" that's about her. Dr. B finds the key to teaching a struggling Elena how to drive.
episodes.title: She Drives Me Crazy

episodes.synopsis: When Penelope has anxiety attacks, her support group helps her figure out what's triggering her, how to cope and why she's not telling her kids.
episodes.title: Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: Schneider makes a big decision in order to please his visiting father -- at the expense of Penelope's family. Lydia finds Alex's confiscated pot.
episodes.title: The Man

episodes.synopsis: When her ex-husband introduces the family to his new girlfriend, Penelope feels unexpectedly resentful and comes to a realization about Mateo.
episodes.title: A Penny and a Nicole

episodes.synopsis: After putting Alex in a difficult position, Schneider gets tough love from Penelope. Dr. B consults Lydia's bouquet list for "non-iversary" gift ideas.
episodes.title: Drinking and Driving

episodes.synopsis: At her ex's wedding, Penelope experiences a surreal conversation. Elena finds she has more she needs to say to her father. Dr. B gives Lydia her gift.
episodes.title: Ghosts
